programme.title: 鳳凰午間專列
programme.desc: 《鳳凰午間專列》: 鳳凰中午的強檔新聞節目, 採取泛中華的報道態度, 關注中國內地的新聞, 也關注香港、台灣以及國際的新聞, 視野更廣闊, 話語空間亦突顯其獨特之處。節目簡潔、實事求事、快人一步, 將新聞帶給正在享用午餐的您, 讓您在休息時段毋須讀報而能輕鬆地接收全球最新出爐的新聞資訊。

programme.desc: 《香港新視點》透過訪問特區政府官員、學者、焦點事件的相關人物, 以及採訪兩地的年輕人的交流團等, 讓觀眾透徹了解香港以至內地政治文化, 加深對國情的認識。

programme.title: 我的香港故事
programme.desc: 《我的香港故事》: 人物記錄專題欄目。通過每集大約15分鐘的精致篇幅, 講述香港人的故事與發生的事。為全國華人觀眾, 了解香港新的視覺。

programme.desc: 《新聞今日談》: 節目針對當天最熱門時事問題, 在觀眾最關注的時刻即時作出評論, 讓觀眾更洞悉事件的真相。

programme.title: 華聞大直播
programme.desc: 《華聞大直播》: 報導兩岸三地和大中華地區的重大事件, 以及與您生活息息相關的最新資訊；第一時間直擊報導新聞時間, 關注時事和社會民生。

programme.title: 鳳凰焦點新聞 2000
programme.desc: 《鳳凰焦點新聞》: 聚焦重大時政議題, 重大社會事件和新聞熱點, 原創性挖掘更多時事與背景, 分析梳理新聞的前因後果, 人物命運, 呈現權威觀點。

programme.title: 鳳凰財經日報
programme.desc: 《鳳凰財經日報》每日精選當天最矚目的經濟數據, 世界各地的政經新聞, 並廣邀各方專家進行連線點評, 提供獨到精闢的見解。亦會向觀眾提供全方位的新聞視覺, 率先把握時局帶來的機遇。

programme.title: 時事直通車
programme.desc: 《時事直通車》: 節目專門網羅國際重大事件和其他集錦新聞、聚焦大陸、台灣及香港的要聞時事。

programme.title: 總編輯時間
programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
programme.desc: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: From Dubai, connecting Asian markets to the European opens - this show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Philanthropist and financier David Rubenstein uncovers inside stories from the most influential minds in business.

programme.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
programme.desc: Roblox CEO & Co-Founder David Baszucki. Bloomberg talks to David Baszucki about the success of the online gaming platform, Roblox.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Etf Iq
programme.desc: Focusing on the opportunities, risks and current trends tied to the trillions of dollars in the global exchange traded funds industry. Hosted by Scarlet Fu, Katie Greifeld and Eric Balchunas.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld break down the day's top market-moving stories and trading action around the closing bell.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade 第1集
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show 第1集
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua 第1集
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: A weekly show on fixed income with the biggest names in the field, covering sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick, Alix Steel and Scarlet Fu break down the day's top stories and trading action around the close.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: What'd You Miss?
programme.desc: Bloomberg TV's flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. It's a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Leaders With Lacqua
programme.desc: Francine Lacqua interviews some of the most influential people on the planet.
